H0.text: what type of government was utilized in ancient egypt. Theocratic Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government was utilized in ancient egypt. Feudal System

H2.text: what type of government was utilized in ancient egypt. Tribal Confederacy

H3.text: what type of government was utilized in ancient egypt. Shura Council

A4.text: The pharaoh was the absolute monarch of the country and, at least in theory, wielded complete control of the land and its resources.

A5.text: The head of the legal system was officially the pharaoh, who was responsible for enacting laws, delivering justice, and maintaining law and order.
